testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: To check if css.transition-timing-function exists

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: Check if the first value that can be parsed as a time is assigned to the transition-duration,the second is transition-delay

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: Check if the transition-delay value is 0s

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: Check if the transition-delay value is 4s and 1s

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: Check if the transition-delay initial value is 0s

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: Check if the transition-duration value is 4s

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: Check if the transition-duration initial value is 0s

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: Check if the transition-property initial value is all

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: Check if the transition-timing-function initial value is ease

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: Check if a negative value for transition-duration is treated as 0

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: Check if the transition-duration value is 4s and 1s

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: Check if the transition-property value is none

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: Check if the transition-property value is all

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: Check if the transition-timing-function value is ease

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: Check if the transition-timing-function value is ease-in

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: Check if the transition-timing-function value is ease-out

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: Check if the transition-timing-function value is ease-in-out

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: To check if 'transition-timing-function' can set 'step-start'

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: To check if 'transition-timing-function' can set 'step-end'

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: To check if 'transition-timing-function' can set 'cubic-bezier' with x [0, 1]

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: To check if 'transition-timing-function' can set 'cubic-bezier' with y exceed [0, 1]

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: To check if 'transition-timing-function' can set 'steps(integer, start)'

testcase.purpose: To check if 'transition-timing-function' can set 'steps(integer, end)'

testcase.purpose: To check if 'transition-timing-function' can set 'cubic-bezier' with invalid x coordinate

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: To check if the remove of transition properties can work properly

step.step_desc: Removes the transition properties while the transition is running, then adds them back in.
step.expected: Transitions should start from the beginning

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: To check if changes transition-duration while the transition is running to ensure that the running transition is not affected

step.step_desc: Changes transition-duration while the transition is running
step.expected: The running transition is not affected

testcase.component: W3C_HTML5 APIs/DOM, Forms and Styles/CSS Transitions Module Level 3 (Partial)
testcase.purpose: To check if left can implement transitionend event normally

step.step_desc: Use WRT to visit the test script file to check if TransitionEnd can implement transitionend event normally
